Package ohos.bluetooth.ble

Class BleAdvertiseCallback

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.bluetooth.ble.BleAdvertiseCallback

  • public abstract class BleAdvertiseCallback
extends Object
    An abstract class for Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) advertising callbacks.

    You can inherit from this class to implement BLE advertising callbacks.

    Since:
    3

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int RESULT_FAIL_ALREADY_STARTED
      Failed to start BLE advertising because it has already been started.
      static int RESULT_FAIL_DATA_ILLEGAL
      Failed to start BLE advertising because the advertising data is larger than 31 bytes.
      static int RESULT_FAIL_ERROR
      Failed to start BLE advertising because an error occurred.
      static int RESULT_FAIL_FEATURE_UNSUPPORTED
      Failed to start BLE advertising because it is not supported.
      static int RESULT_FAIL_TOO_MANY_ADVERTISERS
      Failed to start BLE advertising because no more advertisers can be added.
      static int RESULT_SUCC
      BLE advertising is started successfully.

    • Constructor Detail

    • Method Detail

      • startResultEvent

        public void startResultEvent​(int result)
        Called when BLE advertising is started via BleAdvertiser#startAdvertising(BleAdvertiseSettings, BleAdvertiseData, BleAdvertiseData).
        Parameters:
        result - Indicates the result of starting BLE advertising. The value can be RESULT_SUCC, indicating that BLE advertising is started successfully. The value can also be any of the following, indicating a failure to start BLE advertising: RESULT_FAIL_DATA_ILLEGAL, RESULT_FAIL_TOO_MANY_ADVERTISERS, RESULT_FAIL_ALREADY_STARTED, RESULT_FAIL_ERROR, and RESULT_FAIL_FEATURE_UNSUPPORTED.
        Since:
        3
